title: I am disappointed in the Project Cache week
body: I am annoyed to say that I bought a series of bundles during the week that had the free gemstone + 10x Crates, to which I did not receive my free gemstone in one of these bundles, to then having my store glitch out so that I could not buy the 5 x Crate bundle with bonus orange essence, or keys to unlock other crates. I was then blocked for purchasing too much RP, which I have no problem with, however it then glitched out again and took 3 days to fix, and now that i am finally able to purchase RP again, the bundle is finished. Feeling very cheated, very cheated indeed.

replies.body:
Are you sure you purchased the "Project Strike Augment + Bundle" and not the "Project Strike Augment Bundle"?

If you purchased the first bundle did you check your Hextech Hub?

If you did and it's not there;

Get in touch with Riot’s [Billing & Store Support Centre.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584)

* The primary category is already chosen. 

* Under the secondary select **Billing & Store.**

* For the tertiary category select **RP Purchase Errors.**


http://lolwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/Debonair-Ezreal.jpg

Hey thanks for replying, yeah I did actually purchase the correct bundle, i've looked online and heard that a lot of people missed it too. I've checked under my purchase history, I'll be sure to send them a message!
Welcomed. Hope everything goes well and you're compensated soon!
